data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smit, Harry (2017): New records of water mites from standing waters in Thailand, with the description of nine new species (Acari: Hydrachnidia). Zootaxa 4312 (1): 69-91, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4312.1.3|118 occurrences
